lang.dontShowMeThisMessageAgain: Don't show me this message again
lang.directions: Click on a red hotspot in the schematic or on an item in the Equipment menu to see corresponding lubricant information. To view more of the schematic, click and drag with your mouse or use the arrow keys on your keyboard.
lang.touchModeQuestion: It appears you’re using a touch-enabled device. Would you prefer to use the touch-optimized interface?

products.name: Mobil Polyrex™ EM
products.information: Premium-quality electric motor bearing grease
products.benefits: Helps extend bearing life to improve electric motor reliability

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ 100
products.information: High performance synthetic greases for electric motor bearings
products.benefits: Long grease life and bearing protection helping increase motor reliability

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and circulating oil
products.benefits: Improved equipment productivity due to reduced unscheduled downtime and maintenance; long gear and bearing life under high-stress operating conditions; extended oil life; improved energy efficiency compared to mineral oils

products.name: Mobil SHC™ Gear Series
products.information: Synthetic industrial gear oil for gears and bearings
products.benefits: Helps extend gear and bearing life in enclosed gear drives operating under extreme conditions of load, speed and temperature; compared to conventional oils, helps extend oil life and drain intervals and reduce oil consumption, which can lower maintenance costs; helps promote trouble-free operation at high temperatures or in applications subject to water contamination

products.name: Mobilgear™ 600 XP
products.information: Premium-quality gear oil
products.benefits: Micropitting performance, bearing protection, and seal compatibility helps to improve gearbox performance and life

products.information: High-performance synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; easy start-up at low temperature; extended regreasing interval--reduced service cost

products.information: Greases intended for wide variety of applications in severe operating conditions including many industrial sectors

products.name: Mobilgard™ 450 NC
products.information: Non-zinc, non-chlorinated diesel engine lubricant formulated to meet the requirements EMD engines
products.benefits: High TBN and outstanding TBN retention controls deposits and protects critical engine components, zinc free protects silver containing bearings

products.name: Mobilgard™ 12
products.information: High performance diesel engine oils designed for trunk piston engines operating on low sulfur distillate fuels in marine applications
products.benefits: TBN reserve and retention helps to protect engines from corrosive wear; excellent detergency/dispercancy keeps engines clean and helps extend oil life

products.name: Mobilgard™ 1 SHC
products.information: Synthetic high performance diesel engine oil for distillate fuel service
products.benefits: Long oil drain capabilities And extended engine life; extended temperature range performance for quick starts

products.name: Mobilgard™ M
products.information: High performance 50 TBN oils for distillate fueled medium speed engines
products.benefits: High residual fuel compatibility reduces sludge formation for long oil life and cleaner engines; TBN retention and reserve protects engines from corrosive wear

products.name: Mobil Delvac MX™
products.information: High performance diesel engine oils that help extend engine life in the most severe engine applications while delivering outstanding performance in modern, high-output, low-emission engines including those with Exhaust Gas Recirculation (EGR) and After treatment Systems with Diesel Particulate Filters (DPFs) and Diesel Oxidation Catalysts (DOCs)
products.benefits: Reduced low temperature sludge build up and high temperature deposits; lower oil costs due to less make-up oil during operation; excellent low temperature pumpability; long life of critical wear surfaces

products.name: Mobil SHC Pegasus™
products.information: Leading edge gas engine oil providing excellent component protection and increased fuel potential
products.benefits: Advanced technology helps increase efficiency, lower fuel costs and reduces emissions; keep clean performance and wear protection help extend component life

products.name: Mobil Pegasus™ 1
products.information: Synthetic natural gas engine oil
products.benefits: Proprietary formulation minimizes ash deposits, piston land deposits, liner scuffing, and valve seat and valve face wear; will flow at -40 ºC, ensuring good cold start-up properties and effective lubrication at cold temperatures

products.name: Mobil Pegasus™ 1005
products.information: Premium natural gas engine oil
products.benefits: Fewer oil changes help enable lower operating costs and increases productivity; helps to reduce deposits in combustion chamber and pistons to maximize engine efficiency and reliability; helps to reduce deposits in heat exchangers to maximize heat production; helps to minimize deposits to help extend catalytic converter life; fewer lubricant purchases; helps maximize engine reliability and performance

products.name: Mobil SHC™ Gear Series
products.information: Synthetic industrial gear oil for gears and bearings
products.benefits: Helps extend gear and bearing life in enclosed gear drives operating under extreme conditions of load, speed and temperature; compared to conventional oils, helps extend oil life and drain intervals and reduce oil consumption, which can lower maintenance costs; helps promote trouble-free operation at high temperatures or in applications subject to water contamination

products.information: Non-chlorinated solvent-diluted open gear lubricant
products.benefits: Forms tenacious film providing long lasting lubrication and protection from rust and corrosion

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™ 462 Moly
